member.name: T:SiraUtil.Attributes.BindAttribute
member.summary: Allows the ability to install Zenject bindings through an attribute. This can help with rapid development and make Zenject setup easier. The default settings for this attribute are , no special contracts, and binds as as Single (Lazy). Make sure to call zenjector.UseAutoBinder() to set it up. If the class this is placed on inherits , , , , , , , , , or it will bind those appropriately unless you provide a custom type contract array.
member.remarks: This simplifies binding, but that doesn't mean s are suddenly useless. Installers are a great way of organization and conditional binding (when you only want to install something if a setting is enabled, etc).

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Objects.Beatmap.BasicNoteRegistration.#ctor(System.Func{GameNoteController,GameNoteController},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new redecorator registration.
member.param: This is called when the object is being redecorated.
The redecoration priority.

Whether to chain this redecoration with others. Every redecoration is now aggregated. The chain will start if the highest priority object has chaining enabled and will stop once a registration in the aggregate has chaining disabled.

member.name: T:SiraUtil.Tools.SongControl.ISongControl
member.summary: An interface to controlling the song state.

member.name: P:SiraUtil.Tools.SongControl.ISongControl.IsPaused
member.summary: Whether or not the game is paused (paused for standard/campaigns/tutorial, menu open for multiplayer).

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Tools.SongControl.ISongControl.Quit
member.summary: Quits the song. In multiplayer this will make you give up and put you in spectator mode.

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Tools.SongControl.ISongControl.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the song. In multiplayer, this only brings up the menu.

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Tools.SongControl.ISongControl.Restart
member.summary: Restarts the song. In multiplayer, this will make you give up and put you into spectator mode.

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Tools.SongControl.ISongControl.Continue
member.summary: Continues the song if already paused.

member.summary: Read the body as a byte array.

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Web.IHttpResponse.Error
member.summary: The error of the response. This will first try to grab the error from an 'error' json field at the root, then go to the http response, and then will go to the native client. Will be null if the request was successful.

member.name: T:SiraUtil.Web.IHttpService
member.summary: An interface for making asynchronous HTTP calls to the internet.
member.remarks: This is a warning. Although this class is public, it is not meant to be inherited normally. Please ONLY receive this through Zenject and do not create your own instance. Future SiraUtil updates might add more to this interface.

member.name: P:SiraUtil.Web.IHttpService.Token
member.summary: The Authroization Bearer token for your requests (primarily used for auth). Defaults to null.

member.name: P:SiraUtil.Web.IHttpService.BaseURL
member.summary: The base URL to prefix all requests with. Defaults to null.

member.name: P:SiraUtil.Web.IHttpService.UserAgent
member.summary: The user agent for your requests. By default, it will be set to: '[Mod Name]/[Mod Version] ([IHttpService Provider Name]; [SiraUtil Version]; Beat Saber; [Beat Saber Version])

member.name: P:SiraUtil.Web.IHttpService.Headers
member.summary: The default headers for your requests. Token and UserAgent are synchronized with this.

member.summary: Creates a HTTP GET request.
member.param: The URL to send the request to.

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Web.IHttpService.PostAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Creates a HTTP POST request.
member.param: The URL to send the request to.
The content to include as a UTF-8 JSON body. The object put in here will be automatically serialized.

member.summary: Sends a message asynchronously.
member.param: The HTTP method.
The URL to send the request to.
The body of the response. It will be application/json.
Additional headers on top of the default headers. This will be combined with the default headers associated with this
The download progress of the request.
The cancellation token to cancel the token with.

member.summary: Beat Saber specific locations which point to a place to install Zenject bindings.

member.summary: Represents no binding.

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.App
member.summary: Installs your bindings in the app context. Anything installed here will be available in every container. The current backing installer is

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.Menu
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto the menu. The current backing installer is

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.StandardPlayer
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto the standard gameplay (Solo or Party) player. The current backing installer is

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.CampaignPlayer
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto the campaign player. The current backing installer is

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.MultiPlayer
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto the local multiplayer player. The current backing installer is

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.Player
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto any player location (Standard, Campaign, or Multiplayer).

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.Tutorial
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto the tutorial. The current backing installer is

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.GameCore
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto GameCore. The current backing installer is
member.remarks: Anything specific to the game level will be installed here. It does not necessarily guarantee that anything player specific (audio managers, saber stuff, note spawning stuff) will be included. Some things you would expect to be in here would be the currently played map (difficulty beatmap).

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.MultiplayerCore
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto the Multiplayer Core. The current backing installer is

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.Singleplayer
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto all Players related to singleplayer (Standard, Campaign, or Tutorial).

member.name: F:SiraUtil.Zenject.Location.ConnectedPlayer
member.summary: Installs your bindings onto every connected player in multiplayer. The current backing installer is

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Zenject.Zenjector.UseMetadataBinder``1
member.summary: Registers your metadata under a UBinder
member.typeparam: The key to retrive it by. Make this a type that is in your assembly.

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Zenject.Zenjector.UseHttpService(SiraUtil.Web.HttpServiceType)
member.summary: Allows you to use SiraUtil's HTTP service system.

member.summary: SiraSync allows you to get generic info about your mod from the internet like the latest version and changelog.
member.param: The type of service to use under the hood.
The username/ID of the owner of the mod/repo in the SiraSync service.
The ID of your mod/repo in the SiraSync service.
member.remarks: This will register this Zenjector into the Sira HttpService if it already isn't so.

member.name: M:SiraUtil.Zenject.Zenjector.UseAutoBinder
member.summary: Registers autobinding support, which provides easy zenject binding installations through the attribute.
member.remarks: This will scan all the types in your assembly, so if you're using strict optional dependencies, warnings will probably be thrown.
